Author: Aireil
Name: FF Logs Viewer
Description: 在游戏里查看玩家在FFLogs上的数据的插件。
Punchline: View FF Logs ranking percentiles in-game.
Changelog:
- 2.0.0.0: Complete rewrite of the plugin, see in /fflogs for more info.
- 2.0.0.1: Fix /fflogs placeholders not opening the window
- 2.0.1.0: Added context menu button back, this is currently disabled in Dalamud, but will automatically work once fixed.
